alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier and central Hendry Counties through 645 PM EDT... Atcluster strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud over Orangetree and near Immokalee, moving east at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Montura, Immokalee, Naples Park, Felda, Orangetree, Hendry Correctional, Devils Garden, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Sunniland, Bunker Hill, Quail Creek Estate, Immokalee, and Lake Trafford. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
